outputs.output_descr: The project preparatory grant is to prepare a full-sized project "Improving sustainability of protected area system at desert ecosystems through promotion of biodiversity-compatible livelihoods in and around protected areas". The overall goal of the project is assist Kazakhstan in implementing relevant aspects of the Convention on Biological Diversity  Program of Work on Protected Areas and the project addresses one of the key priorities of theThe Central Asian Countries Initiative for Land initiative, focusing on promotion of landscape approach to sustainable land management in Kazakhstan.

project_descr: "Improving sustainability of protected area system at desert ecosystems through promotion of biodiversity-compatible livelihoods in and around pasture areas"
